attributes.action: recognise there aint many votes in protecting Trans Men's and Women's rights and to do something positive now
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
1. Transphobia by managements at work can lead to all kinds of covert abuse leading to the Transperson's eventual dismissal.  Such disguised Transphobic abuse is difficult to counteract and this fact should be recognised by strengthening the Law. 

2.  With NHS budgets under ever increasing pressure our Government recognises that this highly vulnerable grouping should receive specific protection to address their health and care needs.
